p: Of the 15,152 samples tested, 8771 (57.9%) were confirmed for a DENV infection by means of real-time RT-PCR and/or NS1 antigen detection. Among the confirmed cases, 8315 (54.9%) were found positives for DENV by RT-PCR and 448 (5%) cases were confirmed by NS1 antigen detection in plasma or in urine samples. The DENV serotypes were determined by real-time RT-PCR or sequencing after a viral culture for 3616 cases (43.5%).
